channel.title: CVE Feed for Pluginic -- FancyPost – Best Ultimate Post Block, Post Grid, Layouts, Carousel, Slider For Gutenberg & Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pluginic -- FancyPost – Best Ultimate Post Block, Post Grid, Layouts, Carousel, Slider For Gutenberg & Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-38686|2024-08-02T04:19:19.435Z -- pluginic -- fancypost%20%E2%80%93%20best%20ultimate%20post%20block%2C%20post%20grid%2C%20layouts%2C%20carousel%2C%20slider%20for%20gutenberg%20%26%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pluginic FancyPost – Best Ultimate Post Block, Post Grid, Layouts, Carousel, Slider For Gutenberg & Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects FancyPost – Best Ultimate Post Block, Post Grid, Layouts, Carousel, Slider For Gutenberg & Elementor: from n/a through 5.3.1.
